name: Jake Estevez
description: Jake Estevez had been a mechanic in the employ of6th Streetfor two weeks before irritating them enough for the gang to chase him off. In the words ofSebastian Ibarra, "Fifteen minutes with the man and my barrel against his forehead, but good news is we found a way to get along." He was apparently a whiz with vehicles, being sought after by individuals for vehicle software modifications. He was the owner of theWicked Tires AutoshopinThe Glenuntil he ran afoul of 6th Street and had to leaveNight City, but not without his truck - a modifiedThorton Colby CX410 Butte, a car that he is planning to...
